adHeader: #1 MEXICAN FOOD TACO STAND ONLY $9 per person
adDetails: Hello! we are a catering company that offers high quality Mexican food, we have a taco stand that we can bring virtually anywhere, your house, workplace, parks, schools,anywhere, and don't need much space. we have a variety of meats to choose: carne asada (steak), grilled chicken, marinated pork (al pastor), carnitas, chile verde, chile colorado, fish or shrimp. Rice and beans (pinto, refried or black) Tasty salsas and chips. For vegetarians, grilled veggies, green salad, tacos and burritos. For children quesadillas, tacos and burritos. Our food isnt greasy like the "others" we,bring utensils : forks and plates. Tasty salsas, limes and chips. Refreshing Aguas Frescas: horchata, watermelon, cantaloupe, strawberry, tamarindo or jamaica. Best customer service! We do last minute events. All you can eat, no limit! We do banquets or buffet style catering ask for options. We only use freshest ingredients . CALL show contact info for more information, ask for Alex. Thanks!
